this_title: Our House: A Very Real Documentary About Kids of Gay & Lesbian Parents
introduction: This film is a frank examination of the diverse experiences of children of gay and lesbian parents. The documentary profiles sixteen sons and daughters between the ages of four and twenty-three in five diverse families who are facing the usual highs and lows of growing up while encountering varied reactions from extended family, classmates, teachers, neighbors, and public officials.
foreign_title: Our House: A Very Real Documentary About Kids of Gay & Lesbian Parents
